alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:15PM CDT until June 15 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR TALLAPOOSA COUNTY... At 815 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Sparkling Springs to near Still Waters Resort, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Waverly, Goldville, Hillabee Creek, Eastern Lake Martin, Western Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Wind Creek State Park, Still Waters Resort, Southern Lake Martin, Daviston, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area, Blue Creek Marina, Horseshoe Bend National Military Park and Hackneyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
